overview: Weâ€™ve all had restless nights, whether it be thoughts that creep into our minds that keep us awake, insomnia, or just a simple bump in the night. But what happens when you finally slip into slumber, only for your dreams to become nightmares? We never know where the dream begins and we never know where it will end. Distorted Dreams invites you to peek into a dream state where edited film cuts from one moment to the next, never knowing where we will end up.
title: Distorted Dream
